item.title: UK’s Law Commission Stresses on Crypto Laws to to Become A Global Leader
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
In their recent recommendation, the UK Law Commission has stressed that the country should develop laws governing crypto assets to ensure that it becomes a global hub for cryptocurrencies and non-fungible tokens. In a statement on Wednesday, June 28, the independent panel noted that the long-awaited recommendations “aim to provide a comprehensive legal foundation for

Shiba Inu layer-2 blockchain Shibarium testnet “Puppynet” reaches a milestone of 25 million transactions. item.description:

item.title: Dormant Dogecoin Address Finally Reawakens, is a Dump Incoming
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
A Dogecoin (DOGE) address that went inactive almost a decade ago has been awakened, sparking a suspicion for selloff in the community. Possibilities of Dogecoin Selloff The insights into the wallet activities was provided by crypto analytics protocol Whale Alert which revealed that the Dogecoin address has indeed been dormant for the past 9.5 years.

The post Dormant Dogecoin Address Finally Reawakens, is a Dump Incoming appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Binance Announces New Functions For Bitcoin, ETH, XRP, SHIB, DOGE Auto Invest
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Tuesday announces enabling API functionality on Auto-Invest for all users. It allows users to automatically invest in their preferred cryptocurrencies amongst over 210 cryptocurrencies supported on Auto Invest. Auto-Invest is a dollar-cost averaging (DCA) strategy feature that allows users to automate crypto investments and grow their crypto holdings.

The post Binance Announces New Functions For Bitcoin, ETH, XRP, SHIB, DOGE Auto Invest appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Tuesday announces enabling API functionality on Auto-Invest for all users. It allows users to automatically invest in their preferred cryptocurrencies amongst over 210 cryptocurrencies supported on Auto Invest. Auto-Invest is a dollar-cost averaging (DCA) strategy feature that allows users to automate crypto investments and grow their crypto holdings.

item.title: Terra Luna Classic To Burn 900 Mln LUNC Reminted From Binance, Total Burn 65 Bln
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
A Terra Luna Classic proposal aims to burn all Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) tokens from the community pool reminted from the crypto exchange Binance’s LUNC burn mechanism. Binance reduced its contribution from 100% to 50% after it discovered that the LUNC burn was being reminted as a community pool fund for developers. Terra Luna Classic

The post Terra Luna Classic To Burn 900 Mln LUNC Reminted From Binance, Total Burn 65 Bln appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Cardano, Solana, Polygon (MATIC) Under Selloff Pressure From Robinhood and Celsius
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Cardano (ADA), Solana (Solana), and Polygon (MATIC) facing a much-anticipated selloff from Robinhood Markets and Celsius. Robinhood will sell these cryptocurrencies on June 27, while Celsius to liquidate its crypto holdings over a period of time starting July 1. Robinhood is also laying off around 150 employees, 7% of its workforce, due to reduced trading

The post Cardano, Solana, Polygon (MATIC) Under Selloff Pressure From Robinhood and Celsius appeared first on CoinGape.
